{bc}to go back to something as an origin or source

dt: {bc}to return to or remember (something in the past)

dt.t: He always {it}harks back to{/it} the good old days of his youth.

dt: {bc}to look or seem like (something in the past)

dt.t: The movie has a style that {it}harks back to{/it} the golden age of Hollywood.
